website_summaries.verdict: A nice smoker for making delicious ribs, poultry, sausages, and more. Comes with useful features including large cook space and a reasonable price.
pros: Has a patented flame disk bowl that's designed to keep grease off the burner
Cooks with propane and delivers nice results
Spacious interior can fit  two whole turkeys at once
Has 4 smoking racks and push-button ignition
cons: Some quality issues noted, including crooked door hinges and broken temperature gauges

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this last month for my husband's birthday. He loves to grill and find it very easy to use . It was easy to assemble and every meal came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: I would not call this as Pro-Series by no means.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin gauge sheet metal. It easily dents and deforms. The smoke is escaping through the doors. It does not seal well. The temperature control know is very flimsy and you can not dial to precise temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Erden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smoking machine!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Easy to maintain the exact temp you want. Lots of room!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Other than temp gauge seems decent
customer_reviews.text: Put this smoker together tonight and it went well all the parts fit with no issues. Seems about as sturdy as my last smoker which worked well (stolen) I do wonder what they were thinking with a 100-700 degree temp gauge?? Generally smoke at 180-220 I’ll update if needed after I use it a few times
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid unit , you will need a cast iron skillet it helps control the wood burning and keeping a consistent temperature . The temperature gauge is pretty accurate there was a 5 to 7 degree higher reading between the unit gauge and the digital gauge I had in the unit . There is some smoke lost from the door, I don't think it that big of a lost you can buy sealant tape if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bennie L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Smoker modification
customer_reviews.text: I like this smoker, it’s very easy to use. The chip pan that comes with the smoke has big holes in it to let the heat into the smoker. The wood chips catch fire and burn up. I did an upgrade modification to fix the wood chip problem and bonus can use charcoal also. The picture is I put two metal rods across the burner heat shield and put a 10 cast iron frying pan on top. This allows you to use charcoal and still put your wood chips in the pan without them catching fire
customer_reviews.author: David West

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Take yuh our time putting it together and you will have a wonderful product at a great price. It is a little smaller then the simular product in the department stores. But... works the same. I use aluminum foil in catch pan and water pan and chip tray just to keep clean and easy cleanup as well. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Robert Cross

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Used once so far with great success. Cooker a little hotter than expected, but temperature easy to control. Turkey was very moist and great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to start and keep the temp on this smoker. It and to use it more than my green egg. No complaints on this product at all
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Door Latchs
customer_reviews.text: The door latches have come apart on first use. Tried to fix and have come apart again. Having trouble getting to Masterbuilt
customer_reviews.author: wayne short

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker. It’s my second one. The only disappointing thing about this smoker is the smoker tray toys out. I foil mine to keep it from rotting.
customer_reviews.author: bkyaskuw

customer_reviews.title: Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This one replaced my old Masterbuilt that was burned away from many years of use
customer_reviews.author: RONALD W RITCHIE

customer_reviews.title: no communication
customer_reviews.text: Daughter gave me this model for my birthday this past August used it twice third time regulator kept catching fire tried to contact master built impossible they don't have my model on there website which is not user friendly and they don't accept phone calls
customer_reviews.author: anthony j.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good smoker. The chip pan has slowly disintegrated over 6 years but no really surprising since it is directly on top of the burner. Some rust problems with the base, but I leave mine outside all year long. The rust issue was easily remedied with metal snips, sheet metal and self tapping screws. I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tommyhawk8

customer_reviews.title: Plan to buy a new one in a year.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality smoker. Works great for about 1 year, then plan to replace it. I’ve purchased 2 of these, (2nd one only due to price, paid $98) and both only lasted a year. Bottom of smoker where burner is mounted completely rusted out and fell apart making the smoker useless.
customer_reviews.author: Furnman567

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bottom rusted out in 3 years. I pushed it into a 4th. $50/year to rent a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Kazz

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt MPS 230S Propane Smoker, 30"
product_meta.description: There's smoked food, and then there's Masterbuilt smoked food. Masterbuilt's 30-inch Propane Smoker has a removable water bowl and wood trip tray—letting you customize your flavor profiles. A built-in temperature gauge and four chrome-coated smoking racks are the finishing touch on this smoker. Get ready for hours of experimenting, taste-testing, and all-around smoked goodness. Smoke up to 8 chickens, 2 turkeys, 4 racks of ribs or 4 pork butts. Master the art of smoking with Masterbuilt.
feature_bullets: Push-button ignition lights burner quickly and easily
Patented porcelain-coated flame disk bowl allows flame to reach wood chips while shielding burner from grease
Removable porcelain-coated water bowl to add moisture and flavor
Air damper for moisture, temperature, and smoke control
Adjustable door latch and inner door liner helps keep heat in

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
